property_management.title: Property Management in Tenerife
property_management.description: Comprehensive management, transparent accounting, legal advice, and personalized service for homeowner communities.
property_management.text: As certified and experienced property managers in Tenerife, we offer professional, approachable, and efficient management for homeowner associations. We specialize in comprehensive property management, resolving issues, optimizing resources, and ensuring legal compliance. Our multidisciplinary team is committed to transparency, efficiency, and the continuous improvement of every community we manage.

services.title: Community Accounting
services.description: We provide clear, detailed accounting for homeowners' associations. We prepare budgets, financial statements, and settlements in accordance with regulations, ensuring transparent and efficient financial management without surprises.

services.title: Supplier Management
services.description: We coordinate the best service providers for your community: maintenance, cleaning, gardening, renovations, and more. We evaluate and supervise their performance to ensure long-term quality and savings.

services.title: Organization of Owner Meetings
services.description: We handle the convening and coordination of meetings, preparing agendas, legal documentation, and minutes. We facilitate efficient meetings with clear information to support informed, participatory decision-making.

services.title: Technical Inspections of the Community
services.description: We conduct regular inspections to detect issues, oversee works or improvements, and ensure the proper condition of facilities. We act proactively to keep the community in optimal condition.

services.title: Legal and Regulatory Advice
services.description: We provide legal advice specialized in horizontal property law, draft bylaws, and resolve conflicts. We ensure compliance with current regulations for the benefit of the community.

services.title: Document Management and Custody
services.description: We securely store all community documentation: meeting minutes, contracts, bylaws, and more. Easy and organized access, fully compliant with data protection laws (GDPR).

services.title: Insurance Mediation
services.description: We act as intermediaries between the community and insurance companies to handle claims, incidents, and coverage. We represent owners’ interests with professionalism and efficiency.

services.title: Budgeting and Financial Planning
services.description: We design realistic annual budgets and financial plans tailored to each community's needs, promoting savings, sustainability, and expense control.

phrases: Property management in Tenerife with transparency and commitment.
Your community, in expert and professional hands.

vacation_rentals.title: Vacation Rental Management in Tenerife
vacation_rentals.description: Marketing, bookings, guest service, cleaning, maintenance, and tax handling. You earn, we handle everything.
vacation_rentals.text: We specialize in full-service management of vacation rental properties in Tenerife. We optimize your home to maximize income and offer a flawless guest experience. We take care of everything: marketing, reservations, cleaning, maintenance, 24/7 guest support, and tax management. Become a host effortlessly and get the most out of your investment with complete peace of mind.

services.title: Property Promotion on Platforms
services.description: We list and optimize your property on Airbnb, Booking.com, and other top platforms using professional photos, optimized descriptions, and targeted visibility strategies across social media and niche channels.

services.title: Online Booking Management
services.description: We handle the entire booking process: availability, confirmations, cancellations, and guest communication. We maximize occupancy with efficient and automated management.

services.title: Check-in and Personalized Welcome
services.description: We manage guest reception, key handover, identity verification, and a personalized welcome, ensuring a great experience from the start.

services.title: Professional Cleaning and Maintenance
services.description: We ensure flawless cleaning between stays and handle property maintenance. Your home will always be in perfect condition for every guest.

services.title: 24/7 Guest Support
services.description: We provide round-the-clock support throughout each stay, resolving issues and inquiries instantly. This boosts guest satisfaction and ratings.

services.title: Payments and Transparent Invoicing
services.description: We manage all financial aspects of the rental: secure payments, on-time collections, invoicing, and clear monthly reporting for property owners.

services.title: Dynamic Pricing Optimization
services.description: We use smart tools to adjust pricing based on season, demand, and competition, ensuring maximum profitability for your property.

services.title: Licensing and Tax Management
services.description: We provide advice and handle all legal and tax formalities: tourist licenses, income declarations, local fees, and tax obligations — stress-free and compliant.

phrases: Earn money with your vacation rental in Tenerife without complications.
We take care of everything – you just enjoy the monthly income.

vehicle_procedures.title: Vehicle Paperwork Services in Tenerife
vehicle_procedures.description: Transfers, registrations, de-registrations, reports, duplicates, and more. Fast, legal, and hassle-free service in Tenerife.
vehicle_procedures.text: Need to transfer ownership, register a vehicle, or de-register one? At GestoFinca, we handle all vehicle procedures in Tenerife quickly, securely, and without wasting your time. We are an agency authorized by the Spanish Traffic Authority (DGT) and manage the entire process for you: documents, taxes, deadlines, and more. We simplify your life and avoid costly mistakes.

services.title: Ownership Transfer
services.description: We legally and quickly process the ownership transfer of your car or motorcycle, including tax settlement and submission to the DGT.

services.title: Registration of New and Imported Vehicles
services.tax: Excludes possible taxes depending on the case
services.description: We manage the complete registration of your new, used, or imported vehicle. We handle all technical documents, fees, and license plates.

services.title: Registration and De-registration with the DGT
services.description: We handle temporary or permanent de-registrations, as well as re-registration after export or rehabilitation. No queues or paperwork.

services.title: Official Vehicle Report
services.description: We request full DGT reports with technical details, charges, embargoes, and history. Ideal for secure vehicle purchases.

services.title: Duplicate Circulation Permit
services.description: Lost or damaged your permit? We help you get a fast, legal duplicate so you can keep driving without issues.

services.title: Special Circulation Authorizations
services.description: We process special permits for events, testing, special vehicles, or unique transports according to current legal regulations.

phrases: Specialized agency for vehicle paperwork with the DGT in Tenerife.
Your vehicle paperwork done, without hassle or waiting.

We take the necessary time with each client to address their needs in a comprehensive, efficient, and transparent way.& We have solid experience in the sector and a highly qualified and certified team, which allows us to ensure safe and legally backed management. We are committed to our clients’ peace of mind, making sure that every action is aligned with current regulations and the highest industry standards.

section1.text: Cookies are small text files stored on your device. They allow the website to remember your actions and preferences over time.

section2.title: 2. Types of cookies we use
list: Necessary cookies: Essential for the website to function properly.
Performance cookies: Help us measure and improve site performance.
Functional cookies: Remember your preferences for a better experience.
Advertising cookies: Provide more relevant ads and limit repetition.

section3.title: 3. How to control cookies?
section3.text1: You can manage cookies through your browser settings.
section3.text2: For more information, check your browser’s help section or websites about cookie management.

section4.title: 4. Consent
section4.text: By browsing our website, you agree to our use of cookies. Otherwise, adjust your settings or stop using the site.

section5.title: 5. Changes to the cookie policy
section5.text: We reserve the right to update this cookie policy. Changes will be published here with the last update date.

section6.title: 6. Contact

questions.question: What services are included in property management?
questions.answer: Our services include vacation rental management, property maintenance, homeowners' association administration, and management of payments and invoices.

questions.question: Why do I need a property manager in Tenerife?
questions.answer: A professional property manager in Tenerife handles all operational aspects, maximizes your investment’s profitability, manages tenants, and solves issues while you're away — especially important for foreign property owners.

questions.question: What is included in the vehicle administration service?
questions.answer: It includes ownership transfers, vehicle registration, temporary or permanent deregistration, document duplicates, and management of vehicle-related taxes.
